title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.5 - Cutting surfaces
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.5 - Cutting surfaces

State Regulations

Cutting surfaces subject to scratching and scoring must
be resurfaced so as to be easily cleaned, or be discarded when these surfaces
can no longer be effectively cleaned and sanitized. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-4.5

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
